Veratis looked on in awe. He was amazed by her transformation. She 
now had three complete modes. Well two and a half. This griffin mode 
she sported seemed uncontrolled. It was a form that looked as if she 
didn't know how to transform properly, or couldn't decide which to 
transform into. With time she'd probably learn to control it, until 
then it she'd live with it.

Lunarpine watched her transform, the white fur changed into feathers, 
her form was as he remembered it, an owl. A little larger than he 
remembered but the same none the less. When she transformed to her 
half stage it worried him. She had all these new abilities and 
responsibilities but she still had to learn control. He would work 
with her as would Veratis but he didn't know how or what she was to 
be.

OOC Time for me to go to work, I'll play more tomorrow.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> OOC( Yeah, I know, it just made the story line more interesting.)
> 
> Ice::
> She smiled at Lunarpine. She could tell he still cared for her as 
she 
> did for him. 
> 
> She frowned a bit. "Well, gee, things are going to get really 
boring 
> around here aren't they." She sighed and knew it was to the good of 
> the planet.
> 
> She heard him give the order to transform. She didn't think she was 
> going to change into what she already knew she could change into. 
She 
> stood on her hind legs and engaged the transfomation order.
> 
> She felt something tingle in her body.  Huge gray wings appeared on 
> her back. Her head changed into that of a great owl, but her body 
was 
> that of a polar bear.
> She squawked and roared. She looked at herself and felt something 
> move inside. She Reared up and finished her transfomation into a 
> Great Owl. She squawked and shifted again. Into full polar bear 
mode.
> 
> her bot mode was now replaced with a griffen type of mode, but 
> instead of Eagle and lion, it was owl and polarbear.
> 
> She looked at Veratis in her bot mode. "OK, so how was that?" 
> 
>

what

there
